name: Countries
description_front:
The style is make with css3, the design is make with Figma, this SPA, have: 
-LandingPage
-HomePage
-ControledForm
-DetailCard
-Filters
-SearchBar
-Paginate
its build with react hooks and redux, but the design is not responsive.
description_back: The database is with PostgreSQL, the relation is has many to has many, have 3 tables, countries table, touristic activities table and the relation table,the API REST is with NodeJs have many routes, to filter information, get information(by id, name, continet, only the names of the countries etc.) and a  post information, to introduce data to the database.

name: VideoGames
description_front:
Designed in figma and builded in css3, have a: 
-Landing Page 
-HomePage 
-Footer 
-Controled Form to create videogames 
-Filters 
-SearchBar 
-Detailed Videogames
description_back: The database is with PostgreSQL, the relation is has many to has many, have 3 tables, Videogames table, Genders table and the relation table,the API REST is with NodeJs have many routes, to filter information, get information(by id, name, continet, only the names of the countries etc.) and a  post information, to introduce data to the database, the videogames are obtained from the database and from a json file with data of a VideoGames External Api, the backend routes are tested with Jest.

name: E-commerce
description_front: I designed the Home page in Figma, Css Responsive, HomePage, Shop Cart, Login System, SearchBar, Filters,Profile, Permisions, NavBar, Routes,ProductsRender, Paginate System, Css Contact Form.

name: Productor Multimedia
description_front: The Design is not mine, i develope all of the page and css.

name: My PortFolio
description_front: I use Bootsrap5 and Css to make all of the style, the data of my projects are in a Json file to evite use a DB, all of the site is responsive, and have a controled form and a render Cv to view and download it, the logic of the detail of each one of my projects its automatizate to dont make a DRY Code.
